title: Crimson
description: Private investigator, Alex Connor, wants to help the woman he secretly loves. When he confronts who he thinks is her stalker, he finds he’s walked into a trap.A vampire needs help locating a cursed artifact and violently plunges Alex into a paranormal world he didn’t believe in. Turned into a vampire against his will, rejected by the woman he desires, tormented by an enemy, and hunted by a man bent on eliminating the local undead population, Alex does his best to stay the course and retrieve the missing artifact.Can Alex save himself and find eternal love before it’s too late or will he fall prey to those who seek to destroy him?
author: Nickie Asher
